item.title: Scream Is Jenna Ortega's Best Horror Movie But This Hidden Gem Is Worth A Watch Too
item.description: Jenna Ortega has been in some major horror movies, but one of her most interesting is the Foo Fighters-starring horror movie, Studio 666.

item.title: 10 Modern Westerns That Are Just As Good As The Classics
item.description: From 3:10 to Yuma and True Grit to Tombstone and more, here are the best modern Western movies that are as good as the classic Westerns.

item.title: You Can Watch Godzilla Fight Another Monster For The Very First Time On Prime Video
item.description: Godzilla fought his first-ever monster villain in his second movie Godzilla Raids Again and here is why the movie is one all fans should watch.
